channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous potholes and poor road surface, 21st August
item.description:
The road is riddled with dangerous potholes and the surface if the road is wearing away. It’s an absolute danger to cyclists and needs urgent attention
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Irving House Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 21st August
item.description:
2 commercial fridges dumped at the northern end of the Honeybourne, near the rear access gates of the PoW Stadium.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Orchard Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedges need cutting along Prestbury Road, 21st August
item.description:
The hedges along the top of Prestbury Road need cutting as the footpaths are getting narrower and narrower. On the side where Prestbury Park is, the footpath is dangerously narrow, and opposite that, when pulling out of Glebe Road, visibility is dangerously poor. Please cut these hedges as soon as possible. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 325 Prestbury Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers left in place, 20th August
item.description:
Resurfacing work was carried out at the entrance to Cherston Court some weeks ago. Barriers are still in place causing problems entering and leaving the road. There has been no evidence of any work being done for some time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Cherston Court, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cans dog mess and litter dumped at the end of Cowper Road, 20th August
item.description:
Cans dog mess and litter dumped at the end of Cowper Road. Please can somebody clear it up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Cowper Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lamppost outside 3 Pitman Road has been badly damaged, 20th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 46 Shelley Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Tagging on a telecoms box Chad Road, 19th August
item.description:
Tagging on a telecoms box Chad Road can someone please come and get it removed

item.title: Overhanging Trees, 19th August
item.description:
These trees are now within 3 metres of my home. I now have to inform my house insurance providers which may incur additional costs. Not only is it a hazard for those that walk underneath it reduces the amount of light in my garden and the height of the the overhanging branches is higher than my home! I have been told this could possibly negate me being able to install solar panels.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Golden Vale, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing sign lifting tarmac from the pavement, 19th August
item.description:
This is a road crossing traffic sign, on Swindon Road, Cheltenham, on the pavement on the opposite side of the road to 249 Swindon Road. The numbers on the sign post are: 19S and 117770. The tarmac pavement at the base of the sign has lifted.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 228 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose manhole cover in road Badgeworth lane GL514UQ, 19th August
item.description:
Every vehicle going over it causes a loud cracking noise which is keeping us awake from 0430 hrs every day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Speeding, 16th August
item.description:
